alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Jefferson (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 5:28PM EDT until June 01 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harrison County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Southeastern Carroll County in east central Ohio... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Carrollton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Scio, Bergholz, Amsterdam, Harlem Springs, and Kilgore. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
